skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light. 
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust you home light - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo. 

After connecting Alexa to your Grid Connect products in a few simple steps:
(1) Download our "Grid Connect" app in android or ios app market;
(2) Register one Grid Connect account in our "Grid Connect" app;
(3) You need to have some Grid Connect devices in hand;
(4) Configure these devices in our "Grid Connect" app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Grid Connect" skill;
(5) Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android, ios or Amazon app market;
(6) Configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
(7) Search "Grid Connect" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(8) Enable "Grid Connect" skill, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
(9) Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
(10) Now all setup is finished. 

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
* Alexa, turn on kitchen light
* Alexa, turn off kitchen light
* Alexa, set the livingroom light brightness to 20 percent
* Alexa, set the bedroom light colour to Blue
* Alexa, turn on livingroom Aircon 
* Alexa, turn off livingroom Aircon
* Alexa, set livingroom Aircon temperature to 20 degree
* Alexa, turn on livingroom Heater 
* Alexa, turn off livingroom Heater
* Alexa, set livingroom Heater temperature to 27 degree
* Alexa, turn on livingroom PIR sensor 
* Alexa, turn off livingroom PIR sensor
* Alexa, turn on Entrance Camera 
* Alexa, turn off Entrance Camera
* Alexa, turn on livingroom fan
* Alexa, turn off livingroom fan
* Alexa, set livingroom fan speed to 30%
* Alexa, turn on livingroom curtain
* Alexa, turn off livingroom curtain
* Alexa, turn on livingroom Tv powersocket
* Alexa, turn off livingroom Tv powersocket
* Alexa, turn on livingroom Wall switch
* Alexa, turn off livingroom Wall switch
